segments.text: let ’ s start with you . How was yours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: it was really busy . I had to work straight through my lunch break .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: did you get to leave early then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my boss told me that I could either go home early or take a long lunch break another day , so I decided to wait and take a long lunch break another time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it was nice of your boss to give you an option . My boss would never do that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: let ’ s get back to you . How was your day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: it was horrible ! It was just one thing after another .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you look pretty upset . Are you ok ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m fine . But I have bad news .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you ’ re kidding ! How did that happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , I was late to work today . It was the third time I was late this week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: you got fired for being a few minutes late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: my boss is really picky about that . He never arrives late , usually works over-time , and always gets his work done on time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: oh well . You never really liked your boss anyway , did you ?
segments.speaker: S1
